author: Richard A. Brooks
title: Seki's industry has 'weathered the storm' through the decades
text:
Seki's industry has 'weathered the storm' through the decades
- Richard A. Brooks
- Updated
0
Tags
As featured on
In the Japanese city of Seki, famed for its razor-sharp artisan knives, news that incoming US tariffs will be lowered is welcome but not entirely unexpected.
